document.full_text: the philadelphia phillies re-armed in hopes of toppling the champion san francisco giants and the boston red sox beefed up their lineup for a title run in the 2011 major league baseball season that starts thursday.
document.title: phillies and red sox top list of world series contenders
lines_and_colors: the philadelphia phillies re-armed in hopes of toppling the champion san francisco giants and the boston red sox beefed up their lineup for a title run in the 2011 major league baseball season that starts thursday.
